pages.text: The $(mob)Valkyrie$() is a neutral monster that spawns in Extreme Hills in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It does not attack players unless attacked first or provoked by remaining too close to it for too long or, at which point it attacks, inflicting $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Weakness$(). It is immune to falling damage, drowning, and Fire, and is resistant to knockback. When a $(mob)Valkyrie$() is reduced to 25% health or lower, it gains a $(thing)Strength$() and $(thing)Speed$() effect.
$(mob)Valkyries$() drop $(item)Golden Apple Pie Slices$() on death, which can be eaten to grant players the same benefits as gained from eating a $(item)Golden Apple$().
$(mob)Valkyries$() rarely drop $(item)The Valkyrie$(), which is a decorative item similar to a $(item)Minotaur Bust$(), representing the $(mob)Valkyrie$() creature.
